response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its intrinsic value and my expectations. I understand that this is a significant investment, but I am confident that the benefits will far outweigh the cost. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
